item.title: Exterior Lights
item.description: User Data CSV File: user_data_exterior_lights.csv Each exterior lights object in the model can be assigned up to nine exterior lighting subcategories in the user data file based on Appendix G Table G3.6. The lighting subcategories are designated by the labels: end_use_subcategory_01 through end_use_subcategory_09 For each subcategory, the appropriate quantity must also be listed, as designated by: end_use_measurement_value_01 through end_use_measurement_value_09 The units of the measurement value are indicated by the last part of the subcategory name:
